attributes.action: Launch an enquiry into the 2014 examination results
attributes.additional_details: This year we have seen a fall in both A level and GCSE results with both years suffering heavy losses of the higher grades, and its seems due to the incompetence of government to keep consistency with its educational system. We need an inquiry about whether or not the government is fit for purpose with organizing the educational system or whether it shall be run by NGO's (non governmental organisations) so that our children's future is not jeaporadised by party politics.
